page.title: 16Adult Recreation.
page.content: Interests named by the farming community were almost exclusively rural. Gardening, breeding rabbits for show at the Bath and West, breeding pheasants, shooting, breeding race- horses and horse racing, Pony Club activities and Young Farmers meetings were all mentioned. Recreational activities of parents of the children at West Ashton school follow below. Not all of the families live in the block, but the activities are typical. My Dad watches T.V all day and if its athletics he is glued to the set.He goes fishing at night when a boat is available. My Mum goes to the gym every 2 weeks and she likes plants. Sarah Johnston age 11. My Dad goes to the Traditional Club every Tuesday. Our family some- times goes swimming and my sister and
